name: Grand Cinema
description: A large modern theatre located in the heart of downtown, featuring multiple screens, premium seating, and state-of-the-art sound systems. It regularly hosts major international releases and special film events.

name: Indie Plex
description: A cozy independent cinema known for showcasing foreign films, documentaries, and local productions. It attracts a loyal community of film enthusiasts and supports emerging filmmakers.

name: Lakeside Screens
description: Situated near the waterfront, this theatre offers a relaxed movie-going experience with scenic views before and after screenings. It is a popular destination for families and weekend audiences.

name: Capitol Theatre
description: A historic theatre that blends classic architecture with modern projection technology. Known for hosting film festivals, premieres, and special retrospectives.

name: Northern Lights Cinema
description: A regional cinema serving local communities with a mix of mainstream blockbusters and independent films. It emphasizes accessibility, comfort, and community engagement.
